titles.title: Take The Sweetness Of Our Youth

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Take the sweetness of our youth,
Blessed Lord we pray, help our lips
To speak no evil, only what You say!
Chorus:
Let us consecrate our lives wholly unto You.
Take the sweetness of our youth, Lord we give to You.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Never let us hate our brother, let us only love.
Let the things we do and say, come from God above.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
There are so many ways we could go, it's hard
To know the one, we only want to choose that way
That leads us to Your Son.
